column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=3518911&postcount=9 laughzilla
hey, this is Azure Tide from yesterday, I'm running 7.10 smoothly on my laptop now, I usedd the terminal to run that lspci thing you said yesterday
and it says Atheros AR5006EG
you wired? and want to get wireless going?
yes sir
open a terminal and see if ifconfig shows more than eth0 and lo (ie ath0 or the like)
it only has those two, but there are alot of lines for them
so i only have Eth0 and Lo in the ifconfig
its only Eth0 and Lo when I use ifconfig
is there a sticker on the bottom of the laptop?
yes there are a few of them, is there somethig I need to look for?
i don't see that sticker on the bottom
what about lspci -nn what does that show--168c:001c?
yes
then that is the 5007 not the 5006 just a second
why would it say "AR5006EG" but have 168c:001c?
the madwifi drivers support that card; the reason for it being listed as 5006 in ubuntu may be a problem with ubuntu not searching for subsection ids (or so I've read)
ok thank you
it says to inter the 7.10 gusty gibbon disk release i386
is that my livecd?
yes
thank you, I'm wireless again ^^with my hour or so of using linux, i'm already head over heals for it :D
wow that was fast; you did all that yourself? congrats!
thanks, I'll prolly hang around this channel to see what else I can learn about linux, do you have any sites I should read about the basics?
